short_summary: Service for Maintenance Plateforme Modifications in Bagotville
description: Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC), on behalf of the Department of National Defence, is issuing this Request for Proposal (RFP) for service for modifications to the maintenance platform in Bagotville. QC. All details related to the requirement are found in the solicitation.
full_summary:
## Government Tender Announcement

### Title (English)
W0138-23A079 - Maintenance Platform Modification Services

### Title (French)
W0138-23A079 - Modification de la plateforme de maintenance

### Reference
WS4334670024

### Solicitation Details

* Publication Date: **December 11, 2023**
* Tender Closing Date: **January 18, 2024, 14:00 EST**
* Amendment Date: **January 8, 2024**
* Expected Contract Start Date/End Date: Not Provided

### Brief Description

Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) invites proposals for the provision of maintenance platform modification services to the Department of National Defence (DND) at the Canadian Forces Base in Bagotville, QC.

### Category and Notice Type

* Category: Service (SRV)
* Notice Type: Request for Proposal (Demande de Proposition)

### Selection Criteria

The proposals will be evaluated based on the lowest price.

### Trade Agreements

* applicable to this solicitation: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

### Regions of Opportunity and Delivery

* Regions of Opportunity: None
* Regions of Delivery: Saguenay

### Contracting and End-User Entities

* Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services Canada (PSPC)
	+ Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5, Canada
	+ Contact Informations: Corine Lavoie (SPAC/PSPC) at corine.lavoie@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

* End-User Entity: Department of National Defence (DND)
	+ Address: 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, ON K1A 0K2, Canada

### Additional Resources

* Solicitation details are available on the Government of Canada Buying Centre website: [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18247394?extsite=MTgyNDczOTRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18247394?extsite=MTgyNDczOTRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

### Deadline
* Tender Closing Date: **January 18, 2024, 14:00 EST** 

Make sure to leave no room for errors,
